message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly useful for someone in your position and I've priced it at a point that reflects that value. Would you be willing to pay $16,000 for it?
Thank you for considering my request, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $14,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $14,000 is a bit too low for me to accept. Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to increase my offer to $14,500 for the product.
